typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Reg as string,
		hinbnBinder as integer,
		hinbnPen as integer,
		hinbnPencil as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> src_unpiot
src_unpiot unpivot(output(
		
	),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot1
